full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: W6888-245037 Cleaning of Kitchen Exhaust
## Notice Type and Status

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Government of Canada's procurement process. The tender has been posted on the Ariba Discovery website. 

## Key Dates
* Publication Date: January 15, 2024
* Tender Closing Date and Time: February 13, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST
* Mandatory site visit: January 30, 2024 (please register by email)

## Background and Scope of the Project

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors to provide all labour, materials, and equipment required for the cleaning of kitchen exhaust systems in various locations of Canadian Forces Base (CFB) 8 Wing Trenton. The scope of work includes three types of cleaning:

1. Minor Cleanings (annual or monthly)
2. Major Cleanings (bi-annual)
3. Occasional Cleanings (as and when required)

## Procurement Method and Criteria

This tender is conducted through an open bidding process, where the selection criterion is the lowest price. The tender is open to all qualified contractors.

## Location and Contact Information

The project is located in various locations of CFB 8 Wing Trenton in Ontario. For more information, please contact:

Ramnarine, Vashti (SPAC/PSPC)
vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
289-772-7284

Note: The above contact information is for general inquiries only, and bidder inquiries should be directed through the Ariba Discovery platform.

## Documentation and Amendments

All amendments to the RFP will be posted in the Event Messages board in SAP Ariba. The full RFP and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account and you have filled out your Government of Canada profile.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Attachment

Please note that this RFP has been shared with you in plain text; therefore, attachments are not included. You can access the RFP and attachments through the Ariba Discovery website.
